zovuta geometry: Kuphunzira kwa mapangidwe a geometric ndi zomangamanga zochokera, kapena kufotokozedwa ndi manambala ovuta
manambala ovuta: Manambala a mawonekedwe a + bi pomwe a ndi b ndi manambala enieni
gawo lenileni: Mawu omwe ali mu nambala yovuta yomwe ilibe gawo longoyerekeza ngati chinthu
gawo lolingalira: Gawo la nambala yovuta yomwe ili ndi gawo loyerekeza ngati chinthu
zovuta zambiri: Mipata mu geometry yovuta yomwe imakhala yozungulira ma curve ndi malo
mitundu yovuta ya algebra: Mipata mu geometry yovuta yomwe ili njira zothetsera ma polynomial equations
holomorphic zomangamanga: Zomanga mu geometry zovuta zomwe zimakhala zovuta-zosiyana
pulogalamu yachitsanzo yochepa: Pulogalamu mu zovuta za geometry yogawa mitundu yovuta komanso mitundu yovuta ya algebraic
moduli spaces: Mipata mu geometry yovuta yomwe imayika mtundu wina wa chinthu cha geometric
calabi kuganiza: Lingaliro la geometry yovuta yotsimikiziridwa ndi Shing-Tung Yau za kukhalapo kwa mtundu wapadera wa metric pamitundu yambiri yovuta.
hitchin-kobayashi makalata: Kulumikizana mu geometry yovuta pakati pa mitolo yokhazikika ya holomorphic vector ndi mayankho a equation yosiyana.
nonabelian hodge makalata: Kulemberana mu geometry yovuta pakati pa mitundu ina yamitundu yambiri yovuta ndi mitundu ina ya ma algebraic
bwinor-einstein metrics: Mitundu yapadera ya ma metric pamitundu yambiri yomwe imakwaniritsa chikhalidwe china
